org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.impl.igfs

Interface HadoopIgfs

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HadoopIgfsEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopIgfsInProc, HadoopIgfsOutProc, HadoopIgfsWrapper

    public interface HadoopIgfs
    Facade for communication with grid.

      • create

        HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate create(IgfsPath path,
                                boolean overwrite,
                                boolean colocate,
                                int replication,
                                long blockSize,
                                @Nullable
                                Map<String,String> props)
                         throws IgniteCheckedException,
                                IOException
        Command to create file and open it for output.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file.
        overwrite - If true then old file contents will be lost.
        colocate - If true and called on data node, file will be written on that node.
        replication - Replication factor.
        props - File properties for creation.
        Returns:
        Stream descriptor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
        IOException

      • append

        HadoopIgfsStreamDelegate append(IgfsPath path,
                                boolean create,
                                @Nullable
                                Map<String,String> props)
                         throws IgniteCheckedException,
                                IOException
        Open file for output appending data to the end of a file.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file.
        create - If true, file will be created if does not exist.
        props - File properties.
        Returns:
        Stream descriptor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
        IOException
